content: **this is a pay what you want pattern use the code poppingpearls50 for 50% off the original price or use the code poppingpearls100 for a free copy if you download for free i d love it if you gave this pattern a ❤️ thank you for your support introducing the *popping pearls coaster* a charming and easy crochet pattern that features simple stitches to create a lovely eye-catching design this quick and straightforward project comes together effortlessly with a delicate and minimalist edging that adds the perfect finishing touch ideal for beginners and experienced crocheters alike the coaster s subtle yet elegant look is perfect for adding a touch of handmade beauty to your space all while being easy and fun to crochet this pattern is made in dk weight yarn with a 4 5mm hook i think a synthetic or plant fiber is best for a coaster as you will want it to be easy care this coaster is worked in the round featuring double_crochet stitch you will work increases in the base incorporating lacy elements and end with a textured simplistic border gauge is not crucial in such a small piece the border features a stitch i created named reverse extended single_crochet stitch it is fun to create and there are instructions for it in the pattern this pattern is written for one size which should be a perfect fit for most mugs if you find that it is too small/too large for your mug i encourage you to experiment with another gauge or the number of rounds this is a beginner friendly pattern it uses basic stitches and includes a photo tutorial at the end of the written instructions there are also links to video tutorials for all the special techniques thank you for choosing my pattern i hope you enjoyed it if you enjoyed this pattern you may be interested in some of my other patterns you can check them out here 1 you may sell as many of the finished items as you wish but if you share on social media please give me credit @elly donner on ravelry and link the pattern to its source if you have any questions or need pattern support please contact me here 2 @stopitharry on ravelry i appreciate your support thank you to my amazing testers jstockert
